title: HOW TO ACHIEVE ALL YOUR 2016 NEW YEAR'S RESOLUTIONS by Greg Williamson & Karyn Boutarasy
desc: If you said yes to those questions, then RSVP NOW to save your seat to learn how instantly build trust with your audience and create a confident connection. ? **This is a 1-hour professional seminar on powerful and outcome-producing speaker behavior you need to learn now!* ?? Learn how be in a fully confident and powerful emotional state from the moment you step on stage or get in front of a group to present? ???Discover how to utilize authentic audience connection to motivate them to invest in you and your products or service? ? ?Uncover how to use ?behavior flexibility? as a speaker and remain in control of your audience while creating strong ties to them for life-long clients. ? Greg and  Karyn  train entrepreneurs and speakers on how to hone their craft in speaking by stepping up to their powerful self, standing out in the sea of competition, speaking up to be persuasive on stage and captivating an audience and get paid by converting an audience?into paying customers so you can create an amazing lifestyle, do what you love, and help others in the process.? They are Master NLP coaches, success coaches and business coaches.? They are also faculty members of Success Academy.? For more information, go to speakervolution.com
